entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
